name: Spotlight (Blemd, Mondei1)
description:
Die. Remember. Repeat.

This game was made during the Wowie! Game Jam 3.0. So expect minor or major bugs here and there but the game should be fully playable from start to end.

Game idea

Since the topic of the jam is Failure is progress we decided to make a game where you will die but learn from your mistakes to proceed in the levels.

Team
  • Felix Schaar - Level Design, Sounds, UI
  • Nicolas Klier - Level Design, Programming, Animations
